= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *BMA.VB* || Vestibular Nucleus || Equilibrium, Postural Reflexes || Pons ||
|| *BMA.IO* || Inferior Olivary Nucleus || Proprioception Relay from Spinal Cord to Cerebellum || ||
|| *BMA.PB* || Parabrachial Nucleus || Source of short-latency nociceptive input || ||
|| *BMA.CL* || Clarke's Nucleus || Major relay to CR for unconscious proprioception || Posterior thoracic nucleus ||
|| *BMA.CN* || Cuneate Nucleus || Carry fine touch and proprioceptive information from upper body || ||
|| *BMA.GR* || Gracile Nucleus || Carry epicritic, kinesthetic, and conscious proprioceptive information from lower body || ||
|| *BMA.VG* || Vagus Nucleus || Parasympathetic vagal functions in the gastrointestinal tract, lungs || ||
|| *BMA.ARC* || Medullary Arcuate Nucleus || Controlling respiratory frequency || Receives fibers from spitothalamic tract and sends to CR ||
